entry.title: $2400 // * EXTRA LARGE 1 BEDROOM APT * LAUNDRY * BACKYARD * PRIME LOCATION *
entry.content:
Extra large and huge one bedroom apartment, NOT Fancy, but if you need space and a great location, THIS IS THE RIGHT SPACE!!!

OLD SCHOOL LAYOUT - FRONT TO BACK APT , WITH TONS OF EXTRA SPACE!!!

Large one bedroom, HUGE full dining / living room with windows and updated kitchen appliances!

Building is updated with on site Laundry room and FURNISHED BACKYARD !!!

PRIME LOCATION in Famous DOWNTOWN BROOKLYN!
Near the Brooklyn and Manhattan Bridge and the Brooklyn Queens Expressway . There is 8 train lines near by turning your commute into a breeze. F at York St, A C F R at Jay St - Metro Tech, R 2 3 4 5 at Borough Hall, A C at High St, 2 3 at Hoyt St

APARTMENT FEATURES: Large layout with full separate living room and separate kitchen, TWO extra railroad rooms that can be converted for 2nd bedrooms or / and home office space!
The main bedroom is a large king size room with great size closet.
Tall ceiling, Stainless steel new kitchen appliances, Plenty windows throughout the apartment that gets great sunlight! Lots Of Character and Original Detail left for the tenant to enjoy!
HEAT AND HOT WATER INCLUDED!!!

Building Amenities: WASHER DRYER in building, Furnished backyard / garden for the entire building to share.
Guarantors accepted Pets Allowed upon approval.

Guarantors accepted, Pets Allowed *upon approval,
Laundry Room in the building,
Backyard / Outdoor space / Garden
NO BROKER FEE!!!

Showing By Appointment, Contact Izzy show contact info
